description: Returns the number of Config rules that are compliant and noncompliant, up to a maximum of 25 for each.

nested_items.name: ComplianceSummary
nested_items.description: The number of Config rules that are compliant and the number that are noncompliant, up to a maximum of 25 for each.

nested_items.name: CompliantResourceCount
nested_items.description: The number of Config rules or Amazon Web Services resources that are compliant, up to a maximum of 25 for rules and 100 for resources.

nested_items.name: CappedCount
nested_items.description: The number of Amazon Web Services resources or Config rules responsible for the current compliance of the item.

nested_items.name: CapExceeded
nested_items.description: Indicates whether the maximum count is reached.

nested_items.name: NonCompliantResourceCount
nested_items.description: The number of Config rules or Amazon Web Services resources that are noncompliant, up to a maximum of 25 for rules and 100 for resources.

nested_items.name: CappedCount
nested_items.description: The number of Amazon Web Services resources or Config rules responsible for the current compliance of the item.

nested_items.name: CapExceeded
nested_items.description: Indicates whether the maximum count is reached.

nested_items.name: ComplianceSummaryTimestamp
nested_items.description: The time that Config created the compliance summary.
